diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Paraneoplastic ocular cicatricial pemphigoid (POCP) and Paraneoplastic pemphigus (PNP)
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The first patient showed conjunctival scarring, pulmonary symptoms, and a conjunctival biopsy revealing features consistent with POCP alongside a diagnosis of pulmonary squamous cell carcinoma. The second patient with B-cell chronic lymphocytic leukemia developed ocular irritation and systemic symptoms, and the diagnostic studies revealed features consistent with PNP, confirmed by serum studies.
